name: l.root-servers.net
notes:
This is the AS Number dedicated for L-Root.

In all exchange points we ONLY peer with route servers.

Has your organization considered hosting its own L-Root instance?

By hosting an L-root instance (L-single) you help provide your Internet users with a more resilient Internet, reducing the response time your users experience during DNS queries, and demonstrate your organization's commitment to a resilient and stable Internet. For additional information visit: http://www.dns.icann.org/lroot/host/

If you are willing to consider hosting an L-root instance, please contact your nearest ICANN Global Stakeholder Engagement representative http://www.icann.org/en/about/staff/gse , who can facilitate your organization having its own L-root instance.
